<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ghast](/Monsters.aspx?ID=219)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Ghasts—feral, foul-smelling, and constantly hungry—are the more powerful kin of ghouls. They are relentless in the pursuit of their prey.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Ghoul_Ghast.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Ghast](/Monsters.aspx?ID=219)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ghoul" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=218" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 169</row>

**Perception** +8; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 30
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, unconscious

**Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 10 feet. A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 16 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (plus [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) as long as it's sickened on a critical failure). While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, burrow 5 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing plus ghast fever and paralysis

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 slashing plus paralysis

**Consume Flesh** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The ghast is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour. **Effect** The ghast devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 3d6 Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

**Ghast Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 16; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 3d8 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** 3d8 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); **Stage 5** as stage 4 (1 day); **Stage 6** dead, and rises as a ghast the next midnight

**Paralysis**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Any living creature (including elves) hit by a ghast's attack must succeed at a DC 16 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

**Swift Leap** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The ghast jumps up to half its Speed. This movement doesn’t trigger reactions.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-52" />
name: Ghast
